description:
The ideal sandal if you spend a lot of time on your feet. Secure and comfortable, with adjustable straps for the perfect fit. The anatomically-shaped footbed is supportive, and the flexible EVA outsole enables a rolling motion that's good for both feet and body.

  • Smooth and durable oiled leather uppers
  • 3 adjustable straps with buckles
  • Soft anatomically shaped cork latex core between jute layers for stability and moisture management
  • Suede leather lining provides a nice climate for your feet
  • Footbed edge is slightly raised to protect your feet from toe-stubbing
  • EVA outsole for lightweight durability and absorbing shocks
name: Birkenstock Milano CT Oiled Leather Sandals - Men's
